description: Founder of emerging architectural & interior design practice Studio Hagen Hall, takes We Design Homes through a journey of recent projects, including a beautiful 1970’s California-style makeover of a London townhouse.

factsheet.heading: Thoughtful homes series
paragraphs: As part of this year’s festival, We Design Homes invites you to join us in a series of online talks with some of the UK’s leading design-led architects, as they take us through a journey of recent projects whilst discussing what it takes to create some of London's most exceptionally thoughtful homes.

factsheet.heading: Studio Hagen Hall
paragraphs: Louis Hagen Hall, founder of emerging architectural and interior design practice Studio Hagen Hall, takes us through a journey of his recently completed projects, including a beautiful 1970’s California-style makeover of a London townhouse and an impressive transformation of a Victorian terraced house for a growing family.

While demonstrating his pragmatic approach to crafting exceptional spaces, Louis will also show us around some of his other exceptional homes where he plans to exceed and surpass expectations at every turn.

images.title: Canyon House designed by Studio Hagen Hall

name: Creating thoughtful homes with Studio Hagen Hall
